1527.verse: إِن|Not|44|52|225$نَّقُولُ|we say,|72|88|5491$إِلَّا|except (that),|115|132|86$ٱعْتَرَٮٰكَ|have seized you|127|144|8548$بَعْضُ|some|76|92|6202$ءَالِهَتِنَا|(of) our gods|107|124|8546$بِسُوٓءٍ‌ۗ|with evil."|85|93|6543$قَالَ|He said,|73|79|309$إِنِّىٓ|"Indeed, I|85|97|312$أُشْهِدُ ٱللَّهَ|[I] call Allah to witness|174|186|8549$وَٱشْهَدُوٓاْ|and (you) bear witness|174|186|8550$أَنِّى|that I am|82|94|2879$بَرِىٓءٌ|innocent|77|83|5482$مِّمَّا|of what|71|314|216$تُشْرِكُونَ|you associate,|117|360|5483$

1528.verse: مِن دُونِهِۦ‌ۖ|Other than Him.|125|154|4463$فَكِيدُونِى|So plot against me|144|202|8551$جَمِيعًا|all together,|101|158|300$ثُمَّ|then|50|108|293$لَا|(do) not|75|104|30$تُنظِرُونِ|give me respite.|126|126|7094$

1530.verse: فَإِن|So if|53|67|227$تَوَلَّوْاْ|you turn away,|121|149|1245$فَقَدْ|then verily|90|118|1016$أَبْلَغْتُكُم|I have conveyed to you|179|207|6565$مَّآ|what|53|81|262$أُرْسِلْتُ|I was sent|90|104|6594$بِهِۦٓ|with [it]|74|88|204$إِلَيْكُمْ‌ۚ|to you.|68|97|2453$وَيَسْتَخْلِفُ رَبِّى|And my Lord will give succession|236|265|8556$قَوْمًا|(to) a people|107|136|3073$غَيْرَكُمْ|other than you,|124|138|7583$وَلَا|and not|71|77|25$تَضُرُّونَهُۥ|you will harm Him|134|146|8557$شَيْــًٔا‌ۚ|(in) anything.|110|122|472$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|82|58$رَبِّى|my Lord|72|84|2902$عَلَىٰ|(is) on|63|75|52$كُلِّ|all|49|61|185$شَىْءٍ|things|69|75|186$حَفِيظٌ|a Guardian."|100|100|8558$

1531.verse: وَلَمَّا|And when|85|95|852$جَآءَ|came|57|76|4023$أَمْرُنَا|Our command,|115|134|8101$نَجَّيْنَا|We saved|85|104|8559$هُودًا|Hud|66|86|1036$وَٱلَّذِينَ|and those who|118|138|42$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|92|84$مَعَهُۥ|with him,|80|97|1875$بِرَحْمَةٍ|by a Mercy|94|128|6432$مِّنَّا|from Us|70|104|1169$وَنَجَّيْنَـٰهُم|and We saved them|152|186|8560$مِّنْ|from|50|84|53$عَذَابٍ|a punishment|108|125|7871$غَلِيظٍ|severe.|71|71|8561$

1532.verse: وَتِلْكَ|And this|74|87|2028$عَادٌ‌ۖ|(was) Aad,|93|118|8562$جَحَدُواْ|they rejected|110|135|8563$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|(the) Signs|94|119|609$رَبِّهِمْ|(of) their Lord|113|138|54$وَعَصَوْاْ|and disobeyed|115|128|8564$رُسُلَهُۥ|His Messengers|121|130|8565$وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ|and followed|103|121|945$أَمْرَ|(the) command|121|139|6855$كُلِّ|(of) every|87|105|185$جَبَّارٍ|tyrant|68|86|8566$عَنِيدٍ|obstinate.|87|96|8567$

1534.verse: ۞ وَإِلَىٰ|And to|111|121|1836$ثَمُودَ|Thamud|72|91|6535$أَخَاهُمْ|(We sent) their brother|175|194|6504$صَـٰلِحًا‌ۚ|Salih.|85|104|622$قَالَ|He said,|73|92|309$يَـٰقَوْمِ|"O my people!|112|122|513$ٱعْبُدُواْ|Worship|84|97|189$ٱللَّهَ|Allah,|56|83|184$مَا|not|42|69|262$لَكُم|you have|81|108|207$مِّنْ|any|50|77|53$إِلَـٰهٍ|god|53|80|5155$غَيْرُهُۥ‌ۖ|other than Him.|123|150|6486$هُوَ|He|48|61|298$أَنشَأَكُم|produced you|110|119|5872$مِّنَ|from|50|68|156$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|110|100$وَٱسْتَعْمَرَكُمْ|and settled you|132|150|8573$فِيهَا|in it.|54|72|253$فَٱسْتَغْفِرُوهُ|So ask forgiveness of Him,|195|204|8574$ثُمَّ|then|50|74|293$تُوبُوٓاْ|turn in repentance|143|191|8361$إِلَيْهِ‌ۚ|to Him.|67|115|296$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|118|58$رَبِّى|my Lord|72|120|2902$قَرِيبٌ|(is) near,|81|105|1614$مُّجِيبٌ|All-Responsive."|125|125|8575$

1535.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|97|101$يَـٰصَـٰلِحُ|O Salih!|93|108|6560$قَدْ|Verily|56|71|1097$كُنتَ|you were|81|96|1281$فِينَا|among us|83|98|8576$مَرْجُوًّا|the one in whom hope was placed|246|254|8577$قَبْلَ|before|62|68|4626$هَـٰذَآ‌ۖ|this.|59|72|248$أَتَنْهَـٰنَآ|Do you forbid us|128|141|8578$أَن|that|48|61|655$نَّعْبُدَ|we worship|94|107|2966$مَا|what|53|66|262$يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُنَا|our forefathers worshipped?|205|211|8579$وَإِنَّنَا|And indeed we|117|137|8580$لَفِى|surely (are) in|113|152|1513$شَكٍّ|doubt|58|97|4619$مِّمَّا|about what|96|135|216$تَدْعُونَآ|you call us|91|130|8581$إِلَيْهِ|to it,|54|74|296$مُرِيبٍ|suspicious."|97|97|8582$

1527.verse: We only say that some of our gods have possessed you with evil." He said, "Indeed, I call Allah to witness, and witness [yourselves] that I am free from whatever you associate with Allah

1528.verse: Other than Him. So plot against me all together; then do not give me respite.

1529.verse: Indeed, I have relied upon Allah, my Lord and your Lord. There is no creature but that He holds its forelock. Indeed, my Lord is on a path [that is] straight."

1530.verse: But if they turn away, [say], "I have already conveyed that with which I was sent to you. My Lord will give succession to a people other than you, and you will not harm Him at all. Indeed my Lord is, over all things, Guardian."

1531.verse: And when Our command came, We saved Hud and those who believed with him, by mercy from Us; and We saved them from a harsh punishment.

1532.verse: And that was 'Aad, who rejected the signs of their Lord and disobeyed His messengers and followed the order of every obstinate tyrant.

1533.verse: And they were [therefore] followed in this world with a curse and [as well] on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, 'Aad denied their Lord; then away with 'Aad, the people of Hud.

1534.verse: And to Thamud [We sent] their brother Salih. He said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him. He has produced you from the earth and settled you in it, so ask forgiveness of Him and then repent to Him. Indeed, my Lord is near and responsive."

1535.verse: They said, "O Salih, you were among us a man of promise before this. Do you forbid us to worship what our fathers worshipped? And indeed we are, about that to which you invite us, in disquieting doubt."
